dcterms:description: A dataset of tweets crawled from Twitter between October 5th 2013 and January 5th 2014. The dataset includes 1,350,159 tweets, 15 million word tokens, 30,608 unique words, and 3,214 unique hashtags. Tweets were cleaned to include only those with hashtags appearing at least 100 times and words appearing at least 10 times. Hashtags were used to create ground truth labels for evaluation.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset (2013-2014)
